name: Keep (KiwiCave)
description:
Made for the Mini Jam 119: Heaven, my first Game Jam ever.

In this game you have too keep you and all the things in your house in peak condition while you wait. What are you waiting for? Up to interpretation. 

Click on your plants to water them, click on your furniture to repair them, click on the mirror to feed yourself, and click on the door to go to work and pass the days.
